Mutate flew out of the way his left arm taking a hit.
He returned fire from his stun pistol not wanting to
hurt Megatron.

--- robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote:
> In Megatrons blind fury rage, optics that looked as
> if they held the
> burning inferno themselves, looked up at the Mutate.
> Through clenched
> teeth oil dribbled down his face, a mask of rage. He
> aimed upwards, and
> fired at the disgusting mix of robotic parts,
> assuming it was a Maximal.
> "Die Maximal." He screamed, oil frothing from his
> beserked face. THe
> beam of purple fusion energy hurtling towards
> Mutate.
>
----------------------------------------------------------------------
> "Unit online." A small hum from a computer emmited
> from over where the
> old Maximal city used to be.
>
